The aim study evaluate applicability high-load resistance training countermeasure long term space flight , current project two scientific goal . The main objective perform deep examination muscle function MVC weightlessness ( parabolic flight ) . The secondary objective gather insight underlie mechanism structure base investigation target neuromuscular musculotendinous system interaction . The main judgment criterion MVC test three different task : ( 1 ) leg press , ( 2 ) plantarflexion ( 3 ) grip strength . As secondary criterion , ass parameter muscle function easily implement parabolic flight : - Rate force development - Electromyographic activity - Ultrasound measure : fascicle length pennation angle gastrocnemius medialis muscle - Superimposed twitch torque ( M-waves rest V-waves MVC condition ) - Maximum voluntary activation capacity ( % VA ) : % VA = ( 1- [ torque superimpose twitch/torque rest twitch ] ) *100 % . Our primary hypothesis plantarflexion knee extension force generation capacity reduce , grip-force , microgravity phase parabolic flight .
